# Summon Merchant II (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Summoning Spells|summoning]])

**Level:** [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Occultist Spells|Occultist 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 2]], [[2nd Level Witch Spells|Witch 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 minute

**Components:** V, S, F (a gold coin)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** One summoned merchant

**Duration:** 1 minute/level; see text

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Avanced Arcana VII (Necromancers of the Northwest), pg. 63

This functions as *[[Summon Merchant I (Spell)|summon merchant I]]*, except that the merchantâ€™s base value is 200 gp, her purchase limit is 1,000 gp, she has 1d3 minor magic items, and her [[Appraise (Skill)|Appraise]] and [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] modifiers are +7. In addition to offering *[[Detect Magic (Spell)|detect magic]]*, she can also cast *[[Identify (Spell)|identify]]* for 10 gp.
